    • Method Detail

      • loadStandardDistribution

        public void loadStandardDistribution()
        Loads StandardConfiguration into kms. This method only loads the relative values for displaying in Web Interface. Absolute Values are calculated by Javascript and stored using the newGroup-Method.
        Overrides:
        loadStandardDistribution in class State
        See Also:
        State.loadStandardDistribution()
